content: During this call, we will be making forward-looking statements, including statements related to future events or to our future financial performance, and involve known and unknown risks uncertainties and other factors that may cause our actual results, levels of activity, performance or achievements to be materially different from any future results, level activity performance or achievements expressed or implied by those forward-looking statements.
